OpenAI is facing a wave of internal strife and external criticism over its practices and the potential risks posed by its technology.  In May, several high-profile employees departed from the company, including Jan Leike, the former head of OpenAI’s “super alignment” efforts to ensure advanced AI systems remain aligned with human values.
